Reviews.Title: Its all good
Reviews.Author: P. Washington "GoOmBaY"
Reviews.Content: Its a good Laptop... had it for about 2 months now.. works like expected, no problems... I was kinda a skeptic cause its Amazon page really didn't have much information on the Laptop or anything.. But it arrived all brand new and in mint condition.. I am happy with this laptop :)I must revise this review.... Dell do not make good laptops. The video card is going bad.. my DVD players freeze every few seconds.. the screen just goes black for no reason... dont waste your money.. spend a little extra and upgrade to a Apple or Sony.. its pays off in the long run

ProductInfo.Features:
2GB DDR3-1333 RAM
AMD SempronTM V160
15.6" HD TrueLife LED-backlit Display
250GB 5,400RPM Hard Drive
Microsoft Windows 7 Home Premium (64-bit) 3D Black
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron M5030 Laptop Computer 3D Black
